value.name: Trayford Pellerin's family, attorney frustrated by lack of charges will turn to civil action for justice
value.description: The family of Trayford Pellerin and their attorney were angry and frustrated after a grand jury declined to charge the Lafayette police officers who fatally shot him.

video.name: Trayford Pellerin's family, attorney frustrated by lack of charges will turn to civil action for justice

value.name: Getting Answers: Trayford Pellerin
value.description: We're taking an in-depth look into the Trayford Pellerin case and the decision by the grand jury to not indict the officers who shot Pellerin. There have been questions since August of last year when the shooting happened about why police shot to kill.

value.name: No indictment against Lafayette Police officers in shooting death of Trayford Pellerin

value.name: 'It is criminal': Activists, lawyers demand charges against Louisiana troopers in Ronald Greene's 2019 death
value.description: Louisiana State Police did not open an administrative investigation into the troopers’ use of force until 474 days after Ronald Greene’s death.

value.name: Lafayette Police officers who fatally shot Trayford Pellerin won't face charges

value.name: Lafayette Police Officers Won’t Be Indicted in Trayford Pellerin Death
value.description: A Lafayette Parish grand jury today has decided not to indict any of the Lafayette Police officers involved in the shooting death of Trayford Pellerin on August 21, 2020.
